title: Workout of the Week: Train Like Tadej Pogačar at the Tour de France
content:
For this Workout of the Week, we’ll simulate Pogačar’s effort on Plateau de Beille, where he did nearly 7w/kg for 40 minutes after four-and-a-half hours of racing in the heat.

Read the full article at Workout of the Week: Train Like Tadej Pogačar at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
